title: Paris-Nice: Almeida Pips Vingegaard, Dane Snatches Yellow Away from Jorgenson in Controversial Finale
content:
The two-time Tour de France attacked with 2km to go, but ran out of gas against UAE counter-attacks. Jorgenson cedes yellow to Dane.

Read the full article at Paris-Nice: Almeida Pips Vingegaard, Dane Snatches Yellow Away from Jorgenson in Controversial Finale on Velo.
author: ahood
